roleset.name: not guaranteed, sure
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, comparison to certain.

example.name: arg1
example.text: Its future is very uncertain and Christians -LRB- assuming some of you are -RRB- are routinely not treated properly .

example.name: both args
example.text: Potato-butter roll. At first I was uncertain of what was actually happening with this roll.
example.arg: of what was actually happening with this roll

example.name: Ouch. Concatenation of arg1
example.text: Nevermind the fact that he was uncertain to ever play again after fracturing his sixth vertebra at the bottom of a waterslide.
example.arg: after fracturing his sixth vertebra at the bottom of a waterslide
